document_data.mainbody:
Byron Cymrych II, born Merrick Cymrych,  was High King of the Moonshae Isles in the late 9 century DR. He inherited a High Kingship with severely weakened authority and respect owing to the loss of the Crown of the High King by his grandfather.
He was a member of the Cymrych Dynasty and the first son of his predecessor, High King Conn Cymrych. His successor was his second son, Tanner Cymrych.
Byron II assumed the throne of the High King in the , following the death of his father amidst the invasion of the Moonshaes by the Northmen. He changed his name from "Merrick" to "Byron II" in honor of his great-great-grandfather. 
He ruled for seventeen years before dying of illness in the .
